text: @DoctorHenryCT Coronavirus vaccines have never been successful, probably because the common cold does not get a lot of research $.  If everyone works together & shares data, which is possible with the Intertubbies, I'd give it a maybe. That is a lot of chicken eggs that need to be ready on time
